summary: Completed comprehensive testing of financial management application. Backend APIs working excellently (92.9% success rate). Frontend functionality working well with minor UI issues. User registration, login, navigation, and core financial features all functional.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - both status codes indicate authentication failure

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepts pointer events, making dropdown selections difficult

console_warnings.issue: Multiple React warnings about unrecognized props (allowEscapeViewBox, animationDuration, etc.)
Missing Description or aria-describedby for DialogContent

passed_tests: User registration with auto-generated default categories
User login and JWT token handling
Navigation between all pages (Dashboard, Transactions, Categories, Statistics)
Default categories creation (8 categories: Salario, Freelance, Alimentaci√≥n, etc.)
Statistics page with appropriate empty state message
Backend API CRUD operations for categories and transactions
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix modal dialog overlay issue preventing dropdown interactions in category/transaction creation forms. Consider updating Recharts library version to resolve React prop warnings.
